title: Heart Disease Prediction (Machine Learning)
description: An end-to-end project to build and train a machine learning model to predict the probability of heart disease with high accuracy.

title: Breast Cancer Prediction (Machine Learning)
description: Building a model to classify breast tumors (malignant or benign) with 98% accuracy using machine learning algorithms.

title: Hindawi Library Data Analysis
description: Scraping and analyzing data from over 3,444 free and legal books using Python to facilitate access to rich content.

title: Adidas Sales Analysis
description: A comprehensive analysis of sales data to provide integrated reports that help achieve outstanding sales success.

title: E-commerce Customer Analysis (RFM)
description: Analyzing customer behavior in an e-commerce store and segmenting them into strategic groups based on their purchasing transactions.

title: Saudi Commercial Records Analysis
description: Measuring and tracking the growth of new businesses, their geographical distribution, and sectoral diversity to evaluate investment levels.

title: Dubizzle Data Scraping Tool
description: Building a web tool using Python and Selenium to automatically collect car ad data from the Dubizzle website.

title: Amazon Data Scraping Tool
description: Developing a tool to extract product information (title, price, rating) from Amazon search result pages.

title: تحليل RFM لتجزئة العملاء
description: بناء نموذج تحليلي باستخدام منهجية RFM (الحداثة، التكرار، القيمة المالية) لتقسيم العملاء وفق سلوك الشراء وتحديد العملاء الأكثر قيمة.
